name: Space Stations
overview: An educational game focused on maths that was part of "Let's Count" collection. Let's Count helps young children of 4 years and above with early numerical skills for the numbers 0 to 9. Space Stations gives experience in matching number quantities to their number symbols. Your child is captain of the space rocket which is going to put a space station on a distant planet. Your child has to pick the planet that matches the number of solar panels on his/her rocket. When all the space stations are sending out signals strange forces take over the movement of the planets.
